title: Alewife Luxury 1BR | 9/1
posting_body: Unit 503 at The Brook is a spacious one-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment with a private balcony.
Oversized windows let in natural light that spreads throughout the open concept floor plan and warms the Sawyer Mason wide plank wood flooring.
The quartz countertops and the GE Café appliance package in the kitchen will please any home chef.
A multi-functional kitchen island connects the living and dining area for storage and flexibility.
The bedroom features an expansive closet with built-in shelving.
In the bathroom, a luxurious shower-tub combo is accentuated with radiant, glossy tiling.
All residents of The Brook have access to the building's amenities, including a dog wash, bike storage, available garage parking, and a show-stopping roof deck with amazing sunrise/sunset views.
Just minutes from the Alewife MBTA station, Route 2, and all that Greater Boston has to offer.
Virtual tour and floor plan available.
Pictures used in our marketing may occasionally be of model units.
Apartment availability, features and amenities subject to variation and change.
Contact posting agent for the most current and accurate information available.
